title: Riot, why don't you add an item for Bruisers/Tanks that deals AOE or on-hit % HP Damage?
body: Or something like that. I think it would be great if Bruisers etc had a non-AD item for dealing with HP Stacks and it would be great for versing teams with 2 tanks and a Bruiser if you were the solo tank - to be able to pick up such an item so you can sort of help deal with heavy engages and withdraw back to your back-line to try and help deter opponents from jumping your carries.

replies.body: Bruisers/tanks already deal more damage than they should.

Yes let's put more %HP items in the game, this seems like a good idea.

Except for the fact that people won't use it as only a tank item.

A Scaling per level increased % of Current HP Damage item would be balanced and not do significant amounts of damage to AD Carries and AP Carries but would be great against Tanks and semi-effective against Bruisers.

is BoRK/Liandry's not enough?

Would you rather a marksman meta?

I don't think you understand how % HP damage items work if you honestly want another one.

Fact: %HP damage items still work against non tanks, meaning it'll likely become a staple (especially in solo lanes)
